summary: All requirements have been successfully implemented. The rebranding to 'Furever in Our Hearts' is complete across all touchpoints (header, footer, page title). The hero gallery now features the yorkie headstone memorial with updated nameplate. Headstone designs for bird (Tweety) and cat (Whiskers) have been created with grass, pebbles, and nameplates matching the yorkie aesthetic. All three headstones are displayed in the top row of the showcase section.
